name: Beton
preparation:
Filip Stránský of the AnonymouS concept bars in Prague has a traditional specialty. "We drink Becherovka in a traditional drink called the Beton, which was first published in 1967," he says. "It's a twist on a Gin & Tonic."

This recipe originally appeared as part of “Fan of Fireball? This Drink Might Be the Original Version.”

Add the ingredients into a highball glass over ice.

Garnish with a lemon wedge.
